name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience in automating and optimizing backend systems within financial platforms and cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **GCP**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, **Linux**, **Bash**, **Jenkins**, and **Grafana** for seamless deployment and monitoring of applications. Demonstrated expertise in **Cloud Monitoring**, **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, ensuring high system reliability and performance. Strong understanding of SRE principles, including **Incident Management**, **Error Budgets**, **SLI**, and **SLO** metrics in Agile environments. Exceptional ability to enhance operational efficiency while collaborating with cross-functional teams, contributing to the successful delivery of impactful projects at renowned organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

Containerized applications with **Docker** to improve deployment efficiency and streamline CI/CD processes with **Jenkins**.
Automated system monitoring and reporting through **Grafana** and **Cloud Monitoring**, ensuring high availability and performance metrics adherence with SLIs and SLOs.
Developed and maintained backend services in **Python**, optimizing operations and data flow through **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**.
Utilized **Linux** and **Bash** scripts for system automation, monitoring, and incident management, achieving a 90% reduction in response times for alerting and operations.
Engaged in Agile methodologies to enhance team workflows, employing error budgets and incident management strategies that resulted in 95% system uptime across all services.
Led the integration of **Redis** for improved caching mechanisms, reducing latency by 30% in data retrieval processes.
Fostered cross-functional collaboration to ensure compliance and security measures are met, leveraging SRE principles for ongoing system reliability.

Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure automation and environment management, ensuring a scalable and consistent deployment of microservices on Azure App Services.
Implemented container orchestration using **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for efficient deployment and management of services across various environments.
Developed robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI**, automating document workflows and enhancing user onboarding processes with a focus on scalability and reliability.
Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, improving the asynchronous processing of over **500K** financial data transactions per month.
Engineered data pipelines employing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for seamless automation and secure exchange of regulatory data, increasing efficiency by **30%**.
Performed comprehensive security audits to enforce compliance with industry standards, incorporating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure user authentication and access controls.
Led incident management processes, applying **SLI**, **SLO**, and **Error Budgets** best practices to minimize downtimes and enhance service reliability.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams in an **Agile** environment to facilitate smooth system integration and ensure successful release management.
